name: BUST-A-MOVE UNIVERSE
description:
The legendary puzzle game BUST-A-MOVE comes full speed to the Nintendo 3DSâ„¢!

String together colorful bubbles and burst them in the exhilarating puzzles for which the game has come to be known, now upgraded with an all-new feeling of depth. Experience tons of new features such as Challenge Mode and the trophy system. Brace yourself for the 3-D reincarnation of BUST-A-MOVE!
disclaimer: Please use Parental Controls to restrict 3D access for children 6 and under.
